Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to determination of salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund
Summary: Provides that the salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund whose employment with the fire department of the city of New York commenced on or after July 1, 2000 shall be determined in the same manner as members whose employment commenced prior to such date.
LawCode: Amd ยง443, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to determination of salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund
